categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: War of the Bounty Hunters – Jabba the Hutt 1

War of the Bounty Hunters – Jabba the Hutt 1 is the first one-shot comic issue within the Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters event. It was written by Justina Ireland, illustrated by Luca Pizzari, and published by Marvel Comics on July 21, 2021.

JABBA NEVER FORGIVES! JABBA NEVER FORGETS! JABBA THE
HUTT is one of the most powerful and ruthless gangsters in the
galaxy–and BOBA FETT, his most trusted bounty hunter, has
failed him. How will Jabba deal with betrayal? VIOLENTLY. And
what does this have to do with a bounty hunter with ties to the
HIGH REPUBLIC? Justina Ireland and Luca Pizzari's hutt-sized
spectacular is the first of four action-packed "War of the Bounty
Hunters" tie-ins about the criminal underworld's most notorious
hunters and scoundrels, all told by the best Star Wars writers
and illustrators in the galaxy.
